snippet: The number of marriage ceremonies at Lower Manhattan’s cradle of codified romance has jumped by nearly 50 percent since 2008.
abstract: Weddings at Manhattan's marriage bureau have increased by 50 percent since 2008, driven in part by legalization of same-sex marriage in New York City and Mayor Michael Bloomberg's 2009 effort to increase borough's appeal as wedding destination; both bureau and cluster of merchants offer services aimed at adding romance to bureaucratic setting.
lead_paragraph: The number of marriage ceremonies at Lower Manhattan’s cradle of codified romance has jumped by nearly 50 percent since 2008.

headline.main: At Manhattan Marriage Bureau, a Union of Matrimony and Bureaucracy
headline.print_headline: In Manhattan, a Happy Union of Matrimony and Bureaucracy

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
